name: Valentine Candy Break
description:
Valentine Candy Break is a retro arcade game with animated valentine characters, powerups and custom music. Collect bonuses and powerups and break your way thru the 30 Levels. Simple controls and retro arcade action. Collect all the valentine powerups to stack your paddles powerups. (Laser, Fireball, Multi-ball, Sticky paddle, Heart Bomb, Wide paddle, Shield and Invincible paddle)

Try to beat your high score and complete all the levels.
